Articles.Content:
I am able to dock multiple ships in orbit but I cannot figure out how to transfer fuel. This has probably been answered a million times but after extensive searching in the forums I am getting nowhere. If anyone can answer this probably noob question I would really appreciate it. Thank you in advance.

Edited April 14, 2015 by Claw

Alt-Right Click on all tanks you want involved in the transfer. You should see 'Out' and 'In' buttons under each resource.

Clicking 'In' will transfer the resource into the tank from all other selected tanks evenly, and clicking 'Out' will do the reverse.

Note that if you're playing in career mode you have to upgrade one of the buildings (R&D, I think, but could be mistaken) before resource transfer becomes available.
The ALT button was the missing ingredient...thank you very much for your help.

There's a thread here that explains how to change it to answered.

Happy landings!
It's the mod key. By default it's ALT but it's different on different OS.
